output:
Just about a year ago
I set out on the road
Seeking my fame and fortune
And looking for a pot of gold
Things got better, things got worse
I guess you know the tune
Oh Lord, stuck in Lodi
Oh Lord, stuck in Lodi
I'm loaded on the greyhound
And I'll be walking out in my gold
I was just a-passing through
Must have been seven months or more
I ran out of time and money
And it looks like a tomb of freedom I'm free
Oh Lord, stuck in Lodi
Stuck in Lodi
guitar solo
The man from the magazine
He said I was on my way
But somewhere I lost my vision
Ran out of songs to play
Came into town on a one night stand
Looks like my plans fell through
Oh Lord, stuck in Lodi
Stuck in Lodi

While people sat there drunk
